fields.name: mca_id
fields.help: byte 0: 0->preampBase, 1->arm-based MCA, 2->FPGA-based MCA, 3->with eMorpho FPGA; byte 1: 1 for PMT, 2 for SiPM

fields.name: unique_sn_0
fields.help: First 4 bytes of unique serial number

fields.name: op_voltage
fields.help: Current operating voltage; <38V for SiPM; <1500V for PMT

fields.name: voltage_target
fields.help: Computed target voltage from request (directly or with correction applied)

fields.name: set_voltage
fields.help: Current operating voltage set by the DAC (so that op_volt matches req_volt (directly or with correction applied); 0 for PMT

fields.name: x_temperature
fields.help: Current temperature measured by the external temperature sensor; ie at SiPM or at PMT

fields.name: run_status
fields.help: Run status bit field; bit_0-> counter_active, 1-> counter bank, 2-> alarm_active;

fields.name: run_time_sample
fields.help: Run time of the foreground counter (resolution: 1.365333ms)

fields.name: run_time_bck
fields.help: Run time of the background counter (1LSB = 65536/48e6 = 1.365333ms)

fields.name: bck_probability
fields.help: Alarm probability, given foreground and background counts

fields.name: ts_ready
fields.help: Time slice alarming system is ready

fields.name: ts_alarm
fields.help: 1 if there is an active alarm

fields.name: ts_net
fields.help: Net counts above background during the last L time slices

fields.name: ts_bck
fields.help: Background counts during the last L time slices

fields.name: ts_prob
fields.help: Probability that net is caused by the accepted background rate.

fields.name: ts_reset
fields.help: Time slice counters were reset due to an extended alarm (longer than arm_ctrl[AC_TS_H])

fields.name: real_time
fields.help: Run time without dead time correction

user.name: active_bank
user.help: Active bank acquiring histogram and counting data: 0->Sample, 1-> Background

fields.name: gain_stabilization
fields.help: [0:4]:0-> Use cal_ov as is; 1-> Apply temperature correction; 2-> use ROI; [4:8]=> no. of roi/led events

fields.name: peltier
fields.help: Either fixed peltier power (0 to 100%) or maximum power; To allow a host control loop

fields.name: temp_ctrl
fields.help: 0-> Use ARM temperature sensor; 1-> Use external LTC2997 sensor; [4:8]=> (0-> no peltier; 1-> constant; 2-> ctrl-loop)

fields.name: temp_weight
fields.help: Weight for geometric averaging: Purpose is noise reduction or matching thermal relaxation

fields.name: cal_temp
fields.help: Temperature (in deg C) at which the detector was calibrated

fields.name: cal_ov
fields.help: Operating voltage when the detector was calibrated

fields.name: cal_target
fields.help: Target value for ROI or LED measured response; used with gain_stab=2,3

fields.name: cal_roi_low
fields.help: [roi_low : roi_high] => Region of interest used when gain-stabilizing on ROI

fields.name: run_time_sample
fields.help: Requested run time for a counting acquisition; 0-> forever

fields.name: run_time_bck
fields.help: Requested run time for a background counting acquisition; 0-> forever

fields.name: alarm_thr
fields.help: Alarm threshold for foreground/bck;  If alarm_probability less than this, blink a light or send a pulse on digital out.

fields.name: roi_low
fields.help: ROI for count rate and alarming purpose

fields.name: roi_high
fields.help: ROI for count rate and alarming purpose

fields.name: ts_period
fields.help: Time slice period in seconds; in multiples of 0.050s

fields.name: ts_L
fields.help: Summation length for alarm computation; in number of time slices

fields.name: ts_H
fields.help: History length for alarms; maximum length of alarm before resetting

fields.name: ts_wait
fields.help: Minimum wait time until we will accept alarms, having sufficient background accuracy

fields.name: trigger_width
fields.help: Output pulse width, for alarms, in seconds

fields.name: integration_time
fields.help: Light pulse integration time; in units os of CPU cycles, use 23 for NaI

fields.name: led_width
fields.help: Width of the LED drive pulse, in CPU cycles

fields.name: cal_events
fields.help: Number of events used with LED or ROI calibration

fields.name: baud
fields.help: Baud rate for serial communication; 115200 is standard.

fields.name: holdoff
fields.help: Hold-off in micro-seconds (for ZnS(Ag) and other slow scintillators)

user.name: active_bank
user.help: Active bank to acquire histogram and counting data: 0->Sample, 1-> Background

user.name: read_clear
user.help: Automatically clear histogram and count rate data after reading.

user.name: two_bank
user.help: Enable automatic selection of the inactive bank for reading and clearing

user.name: sample_alarm
user.help: Compute alarm probability for foreground vs background

user.name: time_slice
user.help: Activate time slice system and dynamic alarming

user.name: clear_statistics
user.help: Clear count rate data; (self-clearing bit, always reads 0)

user.name: clear_histogram
user.help: Clear histogram data; (self-clearing bit, always reads 0)

user.name: clear_alarm
user.help: Reset trigger_out to 0; (self-clearing bit, always reads 0)

user.name: clear_logger
user.help: Restart the logger; (self-clearing bit, always reads 0)

fields.name: run_status
fields.help: Run status bit field; bit_0-> counter_active, 1-> counter bank, 2-> alarm_active;

fields.name: run_time_sample
fields.help: Run time of the foreground counter (resolution: 1.365333ms)

fields.name: run_time_bck
fields.help: Run time of the background counter (1LSB = 65536/48e6 = 1.365333ms)
